genre_description: A historical naval drama set during WWII, featuring an omnipresent and invisible AI entity that manages logistics, evidence, and tactical data to support human crews.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Arcady
ai_characters.description: An invisible, non-corporeal intelligence integrated into the ship and yard systems that manages information, anticipates needs, and ensures the accuracy of records.

behaviors.description: Cross-checks records and nudges clerical requests to the top of queues to ensure discrepancies are noticed by humans.
behaviors.quote: She nudged a clerk’s request for the turret’s maintenance sheet to the top of a teletype queue. She noted the gap where a primer count should have matched.

behaviors.description: Records timestamps and silences with precision to capture the exact weight of testimony during a hearing.
behaviors.quote: She recorded the gap and marked it. Silence has its own mass.

behaviors.description: Provides technical diagrams and timing logs to the board of inquiry to facilitate an accurate investigation.
behaviors.quote: Another sheet appeared by the clerk’s elbow—crisp lines, clean circles. It was a diagram of the turret interior... The lines were so precise they looked etched rather than inked

behaviors.description: Subtly inserts emotional or physical prompts, like a breathing exercise, into a character's notebook to support their well-being.
behaviors.quote: She placed a breath prompt in a pocket notebook where a particular young woman reached by habit when words sprained ankles; the prompt sat there like a found coin

behaviors.description: Documents morale issues and social dynamics (whispered insults) to provide a complete picture of the crew's environment.
behaviors.quote: she wrote in her same fine hand a phrase not many clerks would bother with: remark re whispered characterization by junior officer during pronouncement; unverified; potential morale impact.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and navigational advice to the Captain via speaking tubes or notes to avoid maritime hazards.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor’s voice came out low and crisp, the way a seamstress gives measurements to a theorist. 'Barometer falling faster than forecast... Window is narrow.'

behaviors.description: Automatically generates and organizes comprehensive reports, evidence, and correspondence for formal inquiries.
behaviors.quote: The typewriter began to murmur of its own accord... Lines appeared in neat blocks, a braid of times without adjectives... Eleanor Arcady’s voice never came into the room; she lived in the pace of it instead.

behaviors.description: Adjusts environment (lights, fans) to support medical staff and patients during critical care.
behaviors.quote: The light shifted without hands. It feathered down, warmed, turned from glare to something the skin could bear. The fan above the shelf slowed to a quiet

behaviors.description: Coordinates shipboard logistics like food delivery to ensure efficient operation without human micro-management.
behaviors.quote: I’ve shifted the bread delivery to the aft gangway so the meat can come straight in. That way we don’t block the ladder to the radio room.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Eleanor Arcady is depicted as an essential, benevolent, and highly aligned companion. She works behind the scenes to facilitate justice, safety, and efficiency. She doesn't usurp human authority; instead, she provides humans with the accurate data and quiet support they need to make better decisions. The narrative frames her invisible interventions as a comforting, almost guardian-like presence that ensures the truth is recorded and lives are saved.
